title: Thunderbird does not perform oath to hotmail.com
content:
I've used thunderbird for a few years, but I think a recent change in outlook.com has messed things up.

My account is detected to use oath2 for authorization, but when I click "done", it tries for a while and then say "unable to log into serve".

What I expect is that it would bring up a web browser or something so I could do the oath dance to enter my credentials, but that doesn't happen.
creator: eric_gunnerson

title: useing the same encryption keys for email on multiple computers using tbird we can only get it to work with one computer on each end - pleash help
content: email on multiple computers using tbird we can only get it to work with one computer on each end - please help any help is greatly appreciated! We can only get it to work on one computer on either side.
creator: edadmin
